contents.name: README
contents.contents: Hi, I'm Rick Sullivan. I'm a student and programmer. Check out my Github account and resume or send me an email at rick@ricksullivan.net. I am looking for a Software development internship over this summer, so send me a message if you think I would fit at your company.

contents.name: Compilers
contents.description: See my coursework for my compilers class. I am writing a compiler for a subset of the C language.

contents.name: Programming Languages
contents.description: See my coursework for my programming languages class.

contents.name: Algorithms
contents.description: See my coursework for my algorithms class.

contents.name: Data Structures
contents.description: See my coursework for my data structure class.

contents.name: Embedded Systems
contents.description: See my coursework for my embedded systems class.

contents.name: Project Euler
contents.description: See my solutions to some Project Euler questions.

contents.name: Too Many Friends
contents.description: In-progress Facebook friend remover. Suggests friends to remove by ranking friends based on how much you choose to interact with them.
